title: Sell Laphroaig Scotch
metaDescription: Sell your Laphroaig whisky. We buy 19 Year, 25 Year, 30 Year, Cairdeas, and vintage releases. Direct offers.
heroSubhead: We buy rare Laphroaig single malts from Islay.
introParagraph: Laphroaig is Islay's most distinctive single malt, famous for its peat smoke and medicinal character. We purchase aged expressions like the 25 Year and 30 Year, annual Cairdeas releases, and vintage bottlings. Sell your Laphroaig collection directly to us for a competitive offer.
whatWeBuy: Laphroaig 10 Year Unblended & Cask Strength (older batches) and more
conditionFactors: White tube/box cleanliness (Laphroaig packaging shows dirt easily)
pricingFactors: Age statement (25+ year bottles are highly valuable)
Cairdeas release year (older Feis Ile bottlings are more valuable)

faqs.question: Which Laphroaig bottles are most valuable?
faqs.answer: The highly aged 25, 27, 30, and 32-year expressions are the most valuable, along with vintage bottlings from the 1980s.

faqs.question: Do you buy Laphroaig Cairdeas?
faqs.answer: Yes, we look for older Cairdeas releases, especially the 2013 Port Wood and other fan favorites.

faqs.question: Do you buy Cask Strength 10 Year?
faqs.answer: We buy older batches (Batch 1-10) of Laphroaig 10 Year Cask Strength.

faqs.question: Does the tube condition matter?
faqs.answer: Yes, Laphroaig's white tubes can yellow or stain. A pristine tube commands a higher offer.

faqs.question: Do you buy independent bottlings?
faqs.answer: Yes, we buy Laphroaig released by independent bottlers like SMWS, Signatory Vintage, and Hunter Laing.

faqs.question: Do you buy Duty Free exclusives?
faqs.answer: Yes, we buy select travel retail exclusives like the PX Cask or An Cuan Mor if they are limited.
